4. PAYMENT


4.1. Redopact is entitled to the fees and commissions for marketing and fulfillment, Redopact may also deduct any amounts due in the form of chargebacks, reversals, or withheld for anticipated claims in accordance with the terms and conditions agreed in the agreement executed between the Vendor and Redopact offline and/or via email.

4.3. Price of a particular product on Redopact platform should be less than or equal to price quoted on vendors own platform.

4.4. The transaction from Redopact to Vendor will be on a N + 10 model basis, where N = Date when the product(s) gets delivered. The payment will be done only on delivered products.

4.5. In case if there arises any issue with the payment made by Redopact to the vendor then the vendor is eligible to raise a query within 30 (thirty) days from the date of payment, post which Redopact shall not be obligated to resolve any such issue and it will be considered that the vendor has no objections to the transactions made.


5. ORDER PROCESSING, FULFILLMENT AND DELIVERY


5.1. Order Processing

It is to be understood and made clear to the Vendor that Redopact will only act as an interface between the vendor and the consumer, and the vendor shall be the seller on records. Consumers will be placing orders using the platform features and order placing system. Redopact will electronically transmit the Order information to the vendor. Further, upon receiving the successful receipt of the transaction Information, Redopact will send a message to each consumer to confirm the receipt of their placed order.

5.2. Order Fulfillment

Once the vendor receives the order receipt, they will be supposed to pack the ordered product as per the guidelines of product packaging and hand over the packed product(s) to the our logistics partner assigned by Redopact. It is agreed and acknowledged by the vendor that our logistics partner shall ship the product(s) and the customer care team of Redopact shall handle any and all queries of the consumer until the vendor’s involvement becomes a necessity. If the vendor fails to fulfill the entire quantity of an ordered product, then the vendor shall cancel that specifically ordered product, and update the same to Redopact and also on the vendor’s panel over the platform. In response to that, Redopact shall notify the consumer with an email notification of such product cancellation. In this case, Redopact shall be also entitled to levy a penalty upon the vendor.

5.3. Shipping Options

The products will be shipped through our logistic services and the vendor shall provide Redopact with the shipping, handling and any other charges for each ordered product(s), separate from the purchase price depending on the selected shipping mode. It is also made explicitly clear and agreed by the vendor that shipping will not be eligible for any product(s) in a region where it breaches any law related.

5.4. Shipping Process

The vendor shall accept and use our logistics partner services that will be responsible for the safe delivery of the product(s) purchased by the consumer.In the event of the contrary, the vendor will be responsible for the shipping of the ordered product(s) to the consumer within the time frame specified for that product(s) visible over the platform or, in case there is no time frame then within the next three days from the date of receiving the order receipt. The vendor shall be responsible for all the shipping charges and also for any charges related to shipping-related problems, damaged or lost Products, late shipments, etc.


6. PACKAGING

The packaging should be eco-friendly at the maximum possible extent. It is mandatory to use corrugated boxes, waste newspaper, kraft paper bubble wrap, eco friendly kraft paper tape etc.


7. CANCELLATIONS, RETURNS, REFUNDS, AND RECALLS


7.1. Cancellations

In the event, the consumer who has placed an order to purchase certain product(s) through the platform. The consumer is further ineligible to apply for cancellation once order is being confirmed on the platform.

7.2. Returns

7.2.1. The Vendor shall acknowledge that, as per return policies laid out for respective product(s). Clothing, Footwear are eligible to receive a Return service from the consumer only if the product is not worn down, washed or used in any manner. The product should be intact, must be in original condition with respective bills/tags/labels, etc. The fare charged for shipping of such product(s) for both sides i.e. delivering and returning back to the vendor will be reimbursed solely by vendor.

7.2.2. For all other General product(s), Return service can only be availed by the consumer when the product turns out to be faulty/defective/the product turns out to be completely different than the one ordered. In such cases the charged fare for shipping of such product(s) for both sides i.e. delivering and returning will be reimbursed solely by the vendor.

7.2.3. In case of Handmade product(s), they can’t be returned since product(s) appear virtually on platform and the ones received may vary slightly per product. Only exceptional case is when a different product is received than the one ordered by the consumer.

7.2.4. In case of a second time return, the buyer has to mail to Redopact email id (support@redopact.com) and will be discussed over the mail.

7.3. Refunds

7.3.1. Redopact shall be responsible for all cash and non-cash refunds. Redopact determines whether a Consumer is due for a refund via credit card, debit card or other form of original payment and accordingly Redopact shall provide the refund to the buyer via the original payment method opted by the buyer (e.g., credit or debit card), if possible; provided that Redopact will have no liability for refunds in excess of the purchase price. The Query should be raised within 48 hours of receiving the product by the consumer through e-mail or platform. In such cases the charged fare for shipping of such product(s) for both sides i.e. delivering and returning will be reimbursed solely by the vendor.

7.4. Recalls

7.4.1. The Vendor shall be solely responsible for any non-conformity or defect in, or any public or private recall of its listed recall of product(s) sold through the platform. If the product(s) is subject to a recall, the vendor shall be responsible for all matters, costs and expenses associated with such recall, including without limitation, notices, refunds, contact and reporting of the recall to any governmental agency having jurisdiction over the affected Products, and compliance with all Applicable Laws with respect to such recall. The vendor shall promptly remove any recalled product from the platform by unpublishing or retiring the product(s) through the Vendor’s Panel.

7.5. Penalties

7.5.1. Breaching the eco friendly packaging concept.

7.5.2. Not updating “out of stock” status on the platform on time.

7.5.3. Not able to provide product to our logistic partner on time.

7.5.4. Providing bad quality/ bad experience on a regular basis.

7.5.5. Breaching any of the above mentioned terms & conditions

7.5.6. Promoting self brand using any note & card with the delivery

(Penalty : In all the above cases, Redopact may impose penalty upto 4 times the price of the product if a vendor does above mentioned mistakes on a regular basis )
